statements: DELETE FROM UnauthorizedAccessAttempts WHERE id = 1 AND username = 'admin';
DELETE FROM UnauthorizedAccessAttempts WHERE access_result = 'failed' AND access_location = 'Main Office';
DELETE FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE username = 'admin' AND attempt_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM access_monitoring_logs WHERE log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM access_monitoring_logs WHERE username = 'user123' ORDER BY log_time DESC LIMIT 5);
DELETE FROM AccessLogs WHERE username = 'admin' AND action = 'LOGIN';
DELETE FROM UnauthorizedAttempts WHERE id = 1 AND username = 'admin';
DELETE FROM AccessLogs WHERE action = 'LOGIN' AND ip_address = '192.168.0.1';
DELETE FROM unauthorized_attempts WHERE status_code = 404 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM user_logs WHERE action_type = 'login' AND timestamp > '2021-12-01'
